name: FCommonUserInitializeParams
doc: Parameter struct for initialize functions, this would normally be filled in by wrapper functions like async nodes

LocalPlayerIndex: What local player index to use, can specify one above current if can create player is enabled
ControllerId: Deprecated method of selecting platform user and input device
PrimaryInputDevice: Primary controller input device for this user, they could also have additional secondary devices
PlatformUser: Specifies the logical user on the local platform
RequestedPrivilege: Generally either CanPlay or CanPlayOnline, specifies what level of privilege is required
OnlineContext: What specific online context to log in to, game means to login to all relevant ones
bCanCreateNewLocalPlayer: True if this is allowed to create a new local player for initial login
bCanUseGuestLogin: True if this player can be a guest user without an actual online presence
bSuppressLoginErrors: True if we should not show login errors, the game will be responsible for displaying them
OnUserInitializeComplete: If bound, call this dynamic delegate at completion of login
